home.professionalSummary: Software Engineer with <yearsOfExperience>3 years</yearsOfExperience> of experience developing scalable backend systems and full-stack applications, with a focus on <specialties>fintech, blockchain, and Web3</specialties>. infinitybase.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Served as <technicalLead>technical lead</technicalLead> driving complete restructuring of service architecture for APIaaS, designed to scale to millions of requests
Developed comprehensive technical documentation including RFCs, ERD diagrams, and sequence diagrams to ensure technical alignment and execution clarity
Acted as team's technical reference, translating business requirements into executable technical tasks and mentoring developers
Built vehicle restriction consultation bot using AWS Lambda, Twilio, and AWS Lex with payment processing via PIX and credit card
Developed escrow bot that acts as trusted third party in vehicle transactions, automating fund release and reducing fraud
Implemented scalable backend API using Bun, Elysia, PostgreSQL, and BullMQ for asynchronous messaging
Conducted code reviews and established quality standards in agile environment for fintech solutions

ganjaMarket.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Developed and maintained full-stack e-commerce marketplace using Node.js, NestJS, Next.js, and MongoDB, serving multiple vendors and customers
Implemented payment processing system with split payment and automated fee calculation for multi-vendor marketplace
Built custom discount and coupon management system, improving customer engagement and retention through personalized promotional campaigns
Provided technical leadership and mentorship, establishing coding standards and ensuring adherence to project timelines
Contributed to architectural technical decisions and platform roadmap

agroshield.title: Decentralized Crop Insurance Platform
agroshield.content: Full-stack decentralized parametric insurance platform addressing Brazil's agricultural insurance gap (only 16% coverage vs 85% in US). Reduces claim processing from 3-6 months to 24-48 hours through automated smart contract payouts.
features: Modular monorepo architecture with smart contracts
Weather data integration with 30+ years of historical data
Three specialized smart contracts (NFT, Manager, Contract)

fuelConnectors.title: Fuel Network Open Source
fuelConnectors.content: Contributed to Fuel Network's wallet connectivity infrastructure, developing cross-chain connectors that bridge EVM and Solana wallets to the Fuel ecosystem.
features: Built wallet connectors for EVM and Solana integration
Redesigned UX for connector testing platform
Improved modal interfaces for better developer experience
